Title: 41981 - # Things You Need In Your Man Cave
Direction: 500 words. Create a list of 3-6 tips for someone who is setting up a man cave. Talk about the things that all man caves need, like a big screen TV, quality sound system, comfy couch, and cool lighting. You can link to your target URL by mentioning using strung lights to decorate with. Your target audience is men.

Title: 41985 - # Ways Parents Can Use Christmas Lights for Their Children’s Playtime
Direction: 500 words. Most parents probably have lots of Christmas lights laying around in storage for the holidays, so why not make use of them year round. Create a list of 3-6 ways that parents can involve Christmas lights into their children’s play time. You can mention things like hanging Christmas lights inside a blanket fort, allowing kids to decorate their room with strung lighting, or setting up lights outdoors for nighttime, imaginative play. Your resource links offer other ideas to discuss. Your target audience is parents. The target URL can be anchored in any sentence the mentions using Christmas, or strung lights.

Title: 41986 - # DIY Projects to Do With Your Kids This Summer
Direction: 500 words. Create a list of 3-6 DIY projects that parents can do with their kids this summer. You can talk about projects involving painting, building, game making, etc. Your resource links offer plenty of projects to discuss. You can link to your target URL by mentioning a DIY project for parents and kids that involves Christmas lights (you will find multiple options in your resource links). Your target audience is parents.

Title: 41990 - # Ways to Use Christmas Lights to Decorate Your Dorm Room
Direction: 500 words. Create a list of 3-6 ways that college students can use Christmas lights to decorate their dorm rooms. You can talk about ideas such as wrapping desks or headboards in strung lights, hanging them along the ceiling, or even doing DIY projects to make things such as lamps, etc. Your resource links give you some ideas to go into detail about. You can link to your target URL in any section that mentions Christmas lights. Your target audience is college students.
